thread.title: Disney's Night of Joy 2015 Lineup and Ticket...
thread.title_full: Disney's Night of Joy 2015 Lineup and Ticket...

title: Disney's Night of Joy 2015 Lineup and Ticket...
text:
Expert Videos MercyMe with Minnie Mouse before Night of Joy at Disney's Magic Kingdom. © The Walt Disney Company 
Disney's contemporary Christian music event — Night of Joy — will celebrate its 33nd year by presenting an unprecedented lineup of Christian music artists. The event will again be held at Disney World's Magic Kingdom. 
Performances will take place at several stage locations between 7:00 p.m. and 12:30 a.m. each evening (following the regular closing of Disney's Magic Kingdom). Popular attractions will also be available for guests to enjoy during Night of Joy hours. The 2015 lineup will feature a host of inspirational performers, including the following (times to be announced at a later date): Friday, September 11*
